      fullText="%5BI%20saw%20that%20there%20were%20a%20lot%20of%20different%20ways%20to%20say%20something%2C%20if%20that%20makes%20sense.%20It%20depends%20who%20you%u2019re%20saying%20it%20to%20and%20why%20you%u2019re%20saying%20it.%20I%20realize%20you%20have%20to%20think%u2014there%20are%20a%20lot%20more%20decisions%20that%20go%20into%20how%20you%20want%20to%20convey%20something%u2026.%20Like%20how%20do%20you%20want%20to%u2014do%20you%20want%20it%20to%20be%20in%20an%20essay%3F%20Like%20literally%20words%20on%20a%20page%20or%20do%20you%20want%20to%20turn%20it%20into%20something%20with%20pictures%20or%20do%20you%20want%20to%20put%20it%20on%20a%20website%3F%20All%20of%20the%20things%20that%20play%20into%20that.%20If%20it%u2019s%20just%20an%20essay%20anyone%20can%20read%20it%20but%20then%20if%20you%20put%20pictures%20with%20it%20you%u2019re%20influencing%20people%20to%20see%20a%20certain%20thing%20or%20if%20you%20put%20it%20on%20a%20website%20then%20how%20do%20people%20navigate%20your%20website%20and%20where%20is%20the%20emphasis%3F%20There%u2019s%20so%20many%20decisions%20that%20go%20into%20that.%5D%28https%3A//hdl.handle.net/2027/fulcrum.10079890/poi.15%29"

afterPoints: >-

  cannot.

---
In our study, we learned that multimodal composition includes image, video, audio, and digital tools. Writers choose among these resources to best convey their meaning to their audience.

frontmatter.afterPoints:

Multimodal composition communicates meaning in ways that text-based writing cannot.
